mapper.update:
update terminal_basic_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
res_time = #{resTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online = #{online,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys = #{sys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ratio = #{ratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rev = #{rev,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ver = #{ver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typ = #{typ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gis = #{gis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warranty = #{warranty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loc = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update terminal_basic_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, res_time = #{resTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online = #{online,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys = #{sys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ratio = #{ratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rev = #{rev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ver = #{ver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typ = #{typ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gis = #{gis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warranty = #{warranty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loc = #{loc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.ratio name , count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by ratio
select case t.online when '1' then '在线' when '0' then'离线' else t.online end name, count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by online
select t.loc name ,count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by t.loc
select t.warranty name ,count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by t.warranty
select t.rev name ,count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by t.rev
select t.ver name ,count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by t.ver
select case t.typ when '1' then '一体机' when '2' then'播放盒+显示屏' when '3' then '播放盒+投影仪' else t.typ end name, count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t group by t.typ
select count(t.oid) name ,count(t.oid) value from terminal_basic_info t where 1=1
SELECT CASE WHEN ONLINE = 1 THEN 'online' ELSE 'offline' END type, count(1) count FROM terminal_basic_info tbi GROUP BY tbi.online
